;----BASE NETWORKS----
;
;
;--ORTHOGONAL ROAD SIZE 1 (0x5C500000) - pass! --
;;0x5C500000,1,0,0x00AA0100,1,0=0x5C500000,1,0,0x00004B00,1,0
;;0x5C500000,3,0,0x00AA0100,1,0=0x5C500000,3,0,0x00004B00,1,0
;;0x5C500000,1,1,0x00AA0100,1,1=0x5C500000,1,1,0x00004B00,1,1
;;0x5C500000,3,1,0x00AA0100,1,1=0x5C500000,3,1,0x00004B00,1,1
;
;--ORTHOGONAL ROAD SIZE 2 (0x5C500080) - pass! --
;;0x5C500000,1,0,0x5C500000,1,0=0x5C500080,3,0,0x5C500080,1,0
;;0x5C500000,1,1,0x5C500000,1,1=0x5C500080,3,1,0x5C500080,1,1
;
;--ORTHOGONAL ROAD SIZE 3 (0x5C500100, 0x5C500180) - pass! --
;;0x5C500000,1,0,0x5C500180,1,0=0x5C500100,1,0,0x5C500180,1,0
;;0x5C500000,3,0,0x5C500180,1,0=0x5C500100,3,0,0x5C500180,1,0
;;0x5C500180,3,0,0x5C500000,1,0=0x5C500180,3,0,0x5C500100,1,0
;;0x5C500180,3,0,0x5C500000,3,0=0x5C500180,3,0,0x5C500100,3,0
;
;LHD attempt
;;0x5C500000,1,1,0x5C500180,1,1=0x5C500100,1,1,0x5C500180,1,1
;;0x5C500000,3,1,0x5C500180,1,1=0x5C500100,3,1,0x5C500180,1,1
;;0x5C500180,3,1,0x5C500000,1,1=0x5C500180,3,1,0x5C500100,1,1
;;0x5C500180,3,1,0x5C500000,3,1=0x5C500180,3,1,0x5C500100,3,1
;
;Size 3 Test
0x5C500100,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5C500100,1,0,0x5C500180,1,0
0x5C500100,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5C500100,1,0,0x5C500180,1,0
0x5C500100,3,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5C500100,3,0,0x5C500180,1,0
0x5C500100,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5C500100,3,0,0x5C500180,1,0
0x5C500100,1,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5C500100,1,1,0x5C500180,3,1
0x5C500100,1,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5C500100,1,1,0x5C500180,3,1
0x5C500100,3,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x5C500100,3,1,0x5C500180,3,1
0x5C500100,3,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x5C500100,3,1,0x5C500180,3,1

;
;--ORTHOGONAL TLA-3 (0x51000000) SIZE 1 (0x5C500200) - pass! --
;RHD code

;
;--REFUGE ISLAND OVERRIDES USING AVE-2 (0x5101E000, 0x5101E080) & ROAD END STUB (0x00000300)--
;--SIZE 1 AVE-2 Crosswalk (0x5C500400) - pass! --
;RHD code

;--ORTHOGONAL TLA-5 (0x51100000) SIZE 1 (0x5C501000) - pass! --
;FLEX piece code SIZE 1
;RHD override

;--ORTHOGONAL RD-4 REFUGE ISLAND DESIGN WITH RD4/AVE4 WIDTH TRANSITION--
